did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two scrapbooks depicting the academic and social life of a Cornell University undergraduate, with particular reference to her courtship with Paul Atterdig (Cornell Class of 1946.)

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two scrapbooks depicting the academic and social life of a Cornell University undergraduate, with particular reference to her courtship with Paul Atterdig (Cornell Class of 1946); includes photographs, clippings, ephemera, and other material with reference to the campus V-12 Program, and many other social activities.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Louise Van Nederynen Atteridg Scrapbooks, #37-5-2851. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Finding aid is a narration describing the contents of the scrapbooks written by Louise Van Nederynen Atteridg.
